title: SLEEP!
text: Getting a good night's rest is crucial for your brain to store into long term memory the concepts you learned that day. That's why sometimes you won't understand something until you wake up the next day.

title: Meal Prep
text: Learning to meal prep is a great way to eat better, save money, and provide high-quality brain fuel.

title: Coffee
text: If it's before noon, be sure to make a new pot of coffee so others won't have to wait.
